charges.charge_description: 18:1014.F LENDING, CREDIT INSTITUTIONS did knowingly and willfully make a false statement for the purpose of influencing actions of Carolina Trust upon a loan applied for (3)

charges.charge_disposition: Committed to custody of US Bureau of Prisons for a term of 14 (fourteen) months. Upon release, shall be on supervised release for a term of 5 (five) years. While on supervised release shall comply with standard conditions adopted by this Court and the following additional condition. 1. Shall perform 200 hours of community service at the direction of the probation officer. Further ordered to pay special assessment of $100.00 due immediately. Court recommends closest available federal facility to the New York area. Defendant to surrender at institution designated by the Bureau or Prisons when notified by the US Marshal. (3)

charges.charge_description: 18:215.F BRIBERY did corruptly solicit, demand and accept and agree to accept monies intending to be rewarded in connection with a loan made by Carolina Trust and 18:2 Aid and Abet (14)

While on supervised release shal comply with standard conditions adopted by this Court and the following additional condition. 1. Shall perform 150 hours of community service at the direction of the probation officer. Further ordered to pay special assessment of $50.00 due immediately. Court recommends closest available federal facility to her home. Defendant shall surrender at institution designated by the Bureau of Prisons when notified by US Marshal. (14)

charges.charge_disposition: Committed to custody of US Bureau of Prisons for a term of 1 (one) day, with credit for time served (one) day. Upon release shall be on supervised release for a term of 3 (three) years. While on supervised release shall comply with standard conditions adopted by this Court and the following additional conditions. 1. Shall perform 100 hours of community service at the direction of the probation officer. 2. Shall participate in a program of testing and treatment for drug/alcohol abuse as directed by the probation officer until such time as the defendant is released from the program by the probation officer. 3. Shall contact the Richland County, SC Sheriff's Department and the Horry County, SC Police Department and attempt to make good all outstanding fraudulent checks. Further ordered to pay special assessment of $50.00 due immediately. (6)
